body.home: Become one of our members and enjoy various exclusive offers, birthday vouchers, discounts, and invitations to exciting events.

faq.title: How to Register to Become a Member of JG Group?
faq.answer: To obtain a JG Group Membership, go to our website: www.member.jaygeegroup.com Or visit the JG Group outlets and scan the QR in our stores.

faq.title: How much does it cost to become a JG Group Membership?
faq.answer: ZERO. Membership Fee for JG Group Membership is Free üôÇ

faq.title: How to get JG Group Membership Points?
faq.answer: To get Points, visit the JG Group store. Before making a transaction, inform the waiter that you are a member of JG Group by providing your mobile number and name, or see JG Group's QR Code Membership for the store.

faq.title: How many JG Group Member Points will you get?
faq.answer: You will get 25 point for every transaction with a multiple of IDR 50,000 (before tax) in all JG Group Restaurant outlets.

faq.title: Will JG Group Points Membership be forfeited if it is not used?
faq.answer:
The validity period of the Points is 1 year since the Points were obtained from the transaction.
Example: Points earned from transactions in June 2020 will expire in June 202.

faq.title: How do you exchange the JG Group Member Points that you have earned?
faq.answer: Points redemption can only be done through the website: www.nahmthaisukibbq.com/member and you will get notification of answers to prizes from the point redemption. Points can be in the form of free products that have been determined or in the form of discounted vouchers to be used for transactions at JG Group Restaurant.

faq.title: Can transactions using Vouchers get Points?
faq.answer: Transactions using Vouchers do not earn Points.

faq.title: Points can be used anywhere?
faq.answer: Points redemption can be done at all JG Group Restaurant outlets.

overview.text: Our Membership is a form of service that provides benefits to customers, where each member will get the privilege of getting Discounts, Gift Points and Gift Vouchers for birthdays. By becoming a JG Group Membership, you will have access to more services than before.

Term.answer: JG Group membership is a free membership program and is intended for personal use only.
JG Group membership members must provide legal and accurate information.
Privileges and benefits will be extended after valid account activation.
Benefits and points accumulated under membership are promotions and have no cash value.
JG Group has the right to change or modify membership benefits at any time.
JG Group membership and benefits are non-transferable & do not apply to other promotions.
To use membership in JG Group outlets, members must follow the policies of each outlet.
JG Group has the right to change or withdraw terms & conditions from time to time without prior notice.
JG Group has the right to terminate, terminate or cancel JG Group Membership at any time and at its sole discretion without notice.
Reward points are points earned from shopping activities at the JG group Outlet.
Shopping points do not apply to purchases through Gojek / Grab.
By registering for this program, you are deemed to have read, understood, accepted and bound by the Terms & conditions of membership.
In any case, JG Group is not responsible for any direct, indirect, incidental, special, or consequential losses arising from JG Group membership.
Points expire one year from the first transaction, and will be reset again.

join.line3: where Jaygee staff will help register you as a member
join.line4: Get more benefits by shopping directly at Jaygee Restaurant

register.benefit: Get Attractive Prices with various more Benefits !
register.benefit2: Register now to get the latest information from Jaygee Group restaurants, from delicious food guides to other interesting promotions!
register.line1: By clicking on the sign above, you are willing to become a member of the Jaygee Group, and have agreed to

police.line1: This Privacy Policy explains the information we collect about you when you interact with us at our restaurants, through customer service, our member/loyalty programs, on Jaygee Group retail websites, our mobile applications (if available), or on our corporate websites (www.jaygeegroup.com) (Collectively our 'Platform'.
police.line2: By submitting information through or using our Platform, you acknowledge that we may collect, use and disclose information in accordance with this Privacy policy, the privacy choices you have communicated to us, and as permitted or required by law. As used in this Privacy Policy, 'Isoide & Nahm', 'our', and 'we' mean Isoide and Nahm, a company headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia, (unless a different legal entity applies to your location as described in section '< b>ADDITIONAL NOTICE' below).
police.line3: Isoide and Nahm reserves the right to change this Privacy Policy at any time to keep it up to date with legal and regulatory requirements and the way we conduct our business and will post any updates on our website. Please check our website periodically for the most recent version of this Privacy Policy. Where permitted by law, your continued access to and/or use of our Platform after such changes constitutes your acceptance of and agreement with our practices. Please review this Privacy Policy periodically so you are aware of the personal information we collect, how we use it, who we may share it with.
police.line4: We are deeply committed to the relationship of trust we have with you, and we take our data protection responsibilities seriously. For more than 160 years, we have created original products by leading through our values. As we continue to innovate in how we deliver products and services in real life, we will combine cutting-edge technology and practices with your privacy interests.
police.line6: How we collect, use and share your personal information
police.line7: We collect data when you interact with us across various touch points, including information that can directly or indirectly identify you ('Personal Information'). As a retail company, we use Personal Information for a variety of business purposes including sharing and combining it with other information we may receive from our retail, and restaurant, technology and other third parties. This section details the types of Personal Information we collect, how we use it, and describes the parties with whom we share Personal Information. See 'ADDITIONAL NOTICES' below for additional information that may apply to you based on your location.

line8.deskription: Includes identifying information such as your name, email address, telephone number, shipping/billing/physical address, online identifiers you share in public forums (such as your social media name), or nicknames.

To administer sweepstakes, surveys or contests

line8.judul: AUDIO, VISUAL, SENSOR AND BIOMETRIC INFORMATION
line8.deskription: Includes data such as audio recordings, visual films or still images, physical and behavioral characteristics or patterns. In some locations, biometric information is considered sensitive Personal Information and is subject to additional protections.

With CCTV cameras at our location.

line8.deskription: Includes browsing data, data about how you interact with our platforms and tools (including online advertisements, text messages and emails) and similar network activity, your IP address, and device identifiers (for example, advertising ID, device model, operating system, device locale , mobile platform, session time, developer ID, and the like), as well as reproductions and recordings of interactions with websites recorded during browsing sessions.

alenia.line1: From your computer or device when you interact with our platform, for example, when you visit our Restaurant or our company websites, our server logs record your IP address and we collect information about how you navigate through our websites.
Through cookies, web beacons, pixels, clear gifs and similar tracking technologies (where you have opted in, if required by applicable law, unless collection is expressly required via cookies).
From the actions you take in response to marketing emails, including whether you open the email, unsubscribe, or purchase the product promoted in the email.
From third parties including collaboration partners who help develop new solutions such as virtual trials.
to make your interactions with us more convenient, for example, recognizing you and your device, or allowing us to hold your basket selections when you exit and then return to the order page.

To deliver relational, transactional and commercial communications, as well as other marketing and advertising materials including through behavioral advertising and cross-device browsing. Cross-device tracing refers to when data is used to make inferences that the user of one device, such as a computer, is the same person who uses another device, such as a cell phone. Then, we can serve ads on both devices' browsers. This usage refers to the choice you make to participate or not.

line8.deskription: We will not knowingly collect Personal Information from users under the age of 13 on our Platform. The offer is intended for users aged 13 years and over. If users or their parents or guardians believe we have collected the Personal Information of minors (under the age of 18), please contact us at customer.service@jaygeegroup.com to delete that data.

line8.judul: BUSINESS PURPOSES AND SHARING FOR ALL TYPES OF DATA
line8.deskription: In addition to the above, we may use any or all Personal Information described in this Privacy Policy for the following business purposes. In addition, our business operations require us to share Personal Information with certain categories of third parties as identified below :

poin.judul: We may use or share the Personal Information we collect to :

alenia.line1: Maintain the safety, security, functionality and integrity of our Platform and other assets or business.
Prevent investigations of, or take action regarding, unlawful activity including but not limited to engaging third parties to screen transactions for suspected fraud or identity theft.
Carry out testing, research, analysis and product development.

Manage, support, and improve and provide a customized and simplified experience with our Platform (portal), including by offering member (loyalty) programs, personalized recommendations, customized suggestions, and the like.

Providing services in-store, on websites, or mobile applications, including processing requested purchases, returns and exchanges, payments, orders, delivery, products, and providing Customer Service.

Evaluate or conduct a merger, divestiture, restructuring, reorganization, dissolution, or sale or other transfer of some or all of our assets, either as a going concern or as part of bankruptcy, liquidation, or similar proceeding in which the Personal Information held is one of the assets involved redirected.
Undertake other business initiatives as described to you when collecting your Personal Information, with your Consent or as permitted by law.

Comply with the law or legally binding process, such as to comply with a subpoena, court order, to enforce our legal rights, or to protect you, us, or others from injury or harm including for safety and loss prevention.
To administer surveys and questionnaires, such as for satisfaction purposes.

Service Providers, including outsourcing of operations, such as for services to or points of presence in countries, cloud computing technology and service providers, credit card processing, marketing and advertising, shipping and logistics, dispute resolution, fraud detection and prevention providers, data management, analytics providers , as well as other third parties with whom we have contractual relationships.
Within our family of brands and with businesses that control, are controlled by, or are under common control with Nahm & Isoide ('Affiliates')
Auditors, consultants, advocates and other entities who use data to provide professional services to us,

Government agencies, law enforcement, regulators, and courts where we must comply with laws, regulations, rules, requests, law enforcement, regulators, and other government agencies or legally binding processes, such as subpoenas, court orders, to enforce rights our laws, or to protect you, us, or others from injury or loss.

Business Transfers, if (i) we or our Affiliates are acquired or may be acquired by, merged with, or invested in by another company, or (ii) if any of our assets are or may be transferred to another company, either as part of bankruptcy proceedings or insolvency or otherwise, we may disclose or transfer Personal Information to potential or actual third party purchasers or other relevant third parties.

We may also anonymize, aggregate, or delete, aggregated Personal Information of all personally identifiable characteristics and may use or share aggregated and anonymized data with third parties for purposes deemed appropriate..

We rely on your choices regarding how your Personal Information is used. Below are some ways in which you can exercise these choices, including how to change or correct Personal Information and how to unsubscribe from marketing emails.

We encourage you to review the entire Privacy Policy to fully understand the choices you may have, such as allowing or blocking cookies, and bold (online) behavioral browsing and ads that request your Personal Information be deleted, or ask about the Personal Information we have collected from you . See `OTHER ADDITIONAL NOTICE ` for additional information that may apply to you based on your location.

When you create an account, sign in, or login to one of our Platforms, you can access, correct, or update your choices and settings. If you receive email marketing communications from us on behalf of any of our brands and wish to exercise an opt-out option from receiving future communications from that brand. You can opt out by clicking the `UNSUBSCRIBE` link in the promotional email section. Likewise, if you receive direct mail from us and wish to unsubscribe, you can opt-out by emailing us <a href='mail:customer.service@jaygeegroup.com'>customer.service@jaygeegroup.com</ a>. Please be sure to include your full name, mailing address, and email address along with the types of Information you do not wish to receive. it may take up to 8 weeks to process direct mail opt-outs.

Some services will allow you to accept or decline the use of geolocation technology, but if you decline, you may not be able to enjoy certain features on our Platform (such as the full `find a store` option). Unless previously explained to you, you are not obliged to provide us with your Personal Information. If you decide not to provide Personal Information, we may, in some cases, be unable to provide products or services to you. Additionally, if you have opted out of certain services, such as marketing communications, you may still hear from us for other purposes such as as necessary to fulfill your orders or respond to customer service inquiries.

We care about the protection of your Personal Information, so we employ reasonable physical, technical and administrative practices designed to help keep it secure including encryption and in some cases techniques that reduce the ability to identify individuals. Personal Information may be accessed by people within our organization, our third party service providers, or this Privacy Policy, or as permitted or required by applicable law. Unless otherwise stated in this policy, the Personal Information we collect is for Indonesia and is managed from our head office in Jakarta.

No collection, storage, or transmission of data, including over the internet or other network, can be guaranteed to be 100% secure, so despite our efforts, we cannot and do not guarantee the security of data you send to us, including on or through our Platform. When you communicate with customer service via email or chat, we ask that you not share sensitive Personal Information through these communication channels. You should take steps to protect against unauthorized access to your password, phone, and computer by, among other things, logging out after using a shared computer, choosing a strong password that no one else knows or can easily guess, and maintaining confidentiality your login and password. We are not responsible for lost, stolen, or compromised passwords or for any activity on your account through unauthorized password activity.

When you register on one of our Platforms, you will need to set up a password to access your information on our site. If you wish to cancel your password or change it, click `Sign In` from any page on the site, and you can access, correct, or update your options and settings from within your account. Please note that we do not ask customers for account information or credit card details via email - if you receive an email claiming to be from us and asking for this information, do not reply.

We retain your Personal Information in accordance with applicable law and as necessary to process the data, unless a longer period is required for purposes such as complying with retention obligations, record keeping or other commercial terms.

line9.subjudul: Cookies, Browsing technologies and Interest-Based Advertising

alenia.line1: We may place, or allow to be placed, cookies, web beacons, and similar technologies on our Platform to provide you with the best experience, perform analytics, analyze traffic, personalize content, offer features and functionality, and offer advertising that match your interests (as discussed above). These technologies include Google Analytics and similar providers. You can learn more about how Google uses information collected through this service at: www.google.com/policies/privacy/partners

Cookies and web beacons are technologies that generally encourage the collection of browsing information. A `Cookie` is a computer file that acts as an identification card for your computer. When you visit a site, a unique cookie is placed on your browser. The purpose of cookies is to differentiate your browser, and related activity, from all other browsers. `Web beacons` interact with cookies to `read` the information they contain. When you visit a site, a web beacon recognizes certain cookies that have been placed on your browser through the cookies we place, but does not necessarily identify you by name, email, or other specifically identifiable Personal Information. .

We and our partners use cookies, web beacons, device identifiers and other technologies to collect information when you use our websites and mobile applications such as your IP address, web browser, mobile network information, browsing information and conversions help. to create a better shopping experience ‚Äì for example, allowing us to hold your shopping cart selections while you navigate away from and then back to the order page, or save an item for a later time when you are not quite ready to buy. Cookies also allow us to recognize you as the account holder when you return to our site. We consider these types of cookies to be necessary for the successful operation of our business. Our use of cookies changes regularly depending on our business and operational needs.

We allow our trusted business partners and third-party advertising companies (including ad servers, ad agencies, technology vendors, or sponsored content providers) to collect your browsing information and numeric identifiers associated with your browser or device to provide personalized advertising on our behalf. with your interests. These advertisements may appear on our website, and on other third party websites. Using tracking technologies, advertising technology companies collect data from a particular browser or device about users' web viewing behavior over time, across unrelated websites, and in some cases combine that data with data collected from other related browsers or devices. the same user or household, and uses that data to predict the user's choices and to serve the user ads calculated to target the user's predicted choices across his or her devices. If you take steps to block advertising cookies or opt out of interest-based advertising, please note that this does not mean you will no longer receive advertising from LS&CO., as this advertising is just one form of digital advertising.

Our systems do not recognize ‚ÄúDo Not Search Me‚Äù browser signals, but some third-party advertising companies that utilize cookies on our website to provide interest-based advertising may allow you to opt-out of such enforcement.

You can block or opt-out of cookies or the collection of data for interest-based advertising by adjusting the settings in your browser. Check your browser's technical information for instructions. If you use a mobile device, your device may also include a feature (‚ÄúLimit Ad Searches‚Äù on iOS or ‚ÄúOpt-Out of Ad Personalization‚Äù on Android) that allows you to opt-out of the collection of certain information through mobile applications used for behavioral advertising purposes. If you block cookies at the browser level or use another computer or browser to access our platform, you should review your cookie settings again.

The placement of cookies, pixels, gifs or web beacons may be subject to additional legal requirements, depending on where you are located. This may include requiring us to share certain technical information, requiring you to select an opt-in option for its use, or supporting a special mechanism for you to select an opt-out option. Additional specific information relevant to your location, if applicable, can be found in our ADDITIONAL NOTICE.

line9.subjudul: Social Media and Third Party Links

alenia.line1: Social media provides tools that our customers use and benefit from, and we include links to several social media platforms as part of our digital offerings. For your convenience and information, we may provide links to other sites, or add features supported by third parties to our websites or applications, which may have privacy policies that differ from ours. We identify features and links provided by third parties, but are not responsible for the content or practices of linked sites. We recommend that you review the privacy policy of each site or understand or any feature you access through our platform before sharing your Personal Information and understand your privacy settings which will determine the degree to which your Personal Information is used, shared or made public.

Please be aware that your Personal Information may be transferred to and maintained on servers or databases located outside of your state, province/territory, or country. If you are located outside the United States, please note that as a global business, we may process and store Personal Information in countries other than your country of residence, including the United States.

By using our Platform and unless such consent is prohibited by law, you consent to the collection, use, transfer and disclosure of your Personal Information, browsing information and communications in accordance with applicable laws in the United States.

Additional data protection and privacy provisions may apply depending on your location. These Terms (our ‚ÄúAdditional Notice‚Äù) are incorporated into and should be read in conjunction with, this Privacy Policy by reference to the applicable jurisdiction. It is updated from time to time to meet specific legal requirements and we encourage you to check the Additional Notices page for an explanation of our privacy practices and rights if you do business with us in any of the following locations. Unless otherwise stated, Additional Notices have the same effective date as Nahm & Isoide. Global Privacy Notice.

If you have questions or concerns about the Levi Strauss & Co. Privacy Policy, please send an email to customer.service@jaygeegroup.com, call us toll-free at +62-21-3146228 (Jaygee), or write to us at JAY GEE GROUP Jl. KH Wahid Hasyim no. 79-81,
Central Jakarta 10350.

about.line1:
A family-run group prides its growth through the people and relationships built over the
years while keeping with their heritage. Each company under the group is a specialist in
the field. PT Sanggar Catur Utama is the leader in Levi‚Äôs Strauss retail, PT Jay Gee
with its family oriented restaurants, and PT Satria Catur Perkasa with its personalized
properties and management.

line2.deskripsi: Empathy can start by paying attention to the world around us. We listen to and answer customer needs,
Integrity means doing the right thing for employees, brands, companies and society as a whole. A code of ethics and social responsibility is our hallmark in doing business

To become great requires courage. Courage is the willingness to tell the truth and challenge hierarchy, accepted customs and conventional values. This means standing up for our beliefs and acting according to our beliefs.
